data.message: I have been trying to get in touch with a live person for DAYS!!! This is so annoying. I ran on my FB Business page, had a coupon to use for both of them however you attempted to charge my card. I need to speak to someone over the phone or by email because this is not something I would like to discuss over a post.

replies.message: Hi Ashley. If you have an ad payment inquiry, you can reach our team by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2yPBCeE. If you believe your account was fraudulently charged, please reach out to your bank. -Tenaya
